channel.title: Homes on Watse Sybesma
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Watse Sybesma

item.description: Biography Welcome to my personal website! I work as a postdoctoral research fellow in the field of theoretical physics at the university of Iceland in Reykjavik. I am happy to be supported through my own grant, received from the Icelandic Research Fund. Currently my work focusses on studying hydrodynamics in absence of boost-symmetry and the application of non-relativistic holography. In 2017, I obtained my PhD degree under the supervision of Stefan Vandoren, at Utrecht University in the Netherlands.
